page.title: 09OXFORD UNITED FOOTBALL CLUB.
page.content: { Oxford United Football Club's}ground is in{Headington.}The team have just been promoted to the{First Division.} This made{history}because{OUFC}were promoted{twice}in{2}seasons, being {champions}both times. The pitch is covered with normal grass and is surrounded by stands on {3}sides, including the visitors' stand and{1}terrace with seats. The ground is not big enough for the number of fans who may be attending the matches, so the{Club}are{pressing} the local{Authority}to provide grounds to rebuild to expand the seating and standing size of the{Club.} Another reason for this is because coaches and cars have to be parked in the neighbourhood much to the {annoyance}of the local residents. The grounds are at present being modified to include a{family stand.}
